entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
